headline: Alaska Air Group: Still A Post-Merger Sell With Continued Headwinds
summary: Alaska Air faces ongoing integration costs from the Hawaiian Airlines merger, which will drag on earnings for at least the next 6-12 months. Learn more on ALK stock here.

headline: Global Airline Stocks Fall
summary: Shares in airlines across the world fell after Israel's strikes on Iran ratcheted up tensions in the Middle East, and pushed up oil prices.  American Airlines (AAL) and United Airlines (UAL) fell in premarket trading.

headline: US Airline Shares Tumble as Iran-Israel Conflict Sends Oil Prices Higher
summary: U.S. airline shares dropped Friday after oil prices jumped and flights were disrupted as fighting between Israel and Iran sparked worries of a broad and protracted Middle East conflict.

headline: US Airline Shares Tumble as Iran-Israel Conflict Spikes Oil Prices
summary: U.S. airline shares are dropping Friday in premarket trading after oil prices spiked and flights were disrupted as attacks on Iran's nuclear program and military leadership sparked worries of a broader Middle East conflict.
